name: 1502 - Blue Sapphire - Robusto
additionalNotes: The 1502 Blue Sapphire is the sixth release under the 1502 brand, which is owned by Global Premium Cigars. It sets itself apart from the other lines in the brand by having a parejo (which has a round cap and straight sides) shape and an open foot. It is a full-strength Nicaraguan puro that combines with a dark, oily maduro wrapper to deliver a warm tobacco flavor highlighted with notes of spice and cedar.Â
